GSD.product_version: versions from v5.6 to before v6.0.3
GSD.description:
remoteproc: Harden rproc_handle_vdev() against integer overflow

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.3 by commit 88b5129b1188964d67cbee93405294e1ed430e72, it was introduced in version v5.6 by commit c87846571587f1c2217f16104586fd33216fc9e0. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: remoteproc: Harden rproc_handle_vdev() against integer overflow
